plot: After commitment in a mental asylum following his father's death, rock & roller Billie Joyce returns to his ancestral home to take possession of the family's hotel.
title: 125 Rooms of Comfort
plot_es: After commitment in a mental asylum following his father's death, rock & roller Billie Joyce returns to his ancestral home to take possession of the family's hotel.
plot_en: After commitment in a mental asylum following his father's death, rock & roller Billie Joyce returns to his ancestral home to take possession of the family's hotel.
